Welcome to our Afghan Rugs Collection at Chargul. Here, you'll find a stunning array of handmade Afghan rugs, each crafted with precision and care. Our collection features a diverse selection of styles, including vintage Afghan rugs, wool Afghan rugs, and more.

Whether you're looking for a red Afghan rug, a blue Afghan rug, or an antique Afghan rug, our collection has something to suit every taste and decor. Each rug is a unique piece of art, reflecting the rich cultural heritage and skilled craftsmanship of Afghan weavers.

Explore our collection and find the perfect rug for your home. We offer a variety of sizes and designs, including the popular 8x10 Afghan rug and many other options. Shop with us for Afghan rugs for sale and experience the beauty and quality of authentic Afghan rugs.

For specific styles, check out our Khal Mohammadi rugs, Baluchi carpets, and Gabbeh Afghan rugs. We also have a range of colors, including black Afghan rugs, green Afghan rugs, and pink Afghan rugs.

At Chargul, we are committed to offering high-quality Afghan rugs that meet the needs of our discerning customers. Browse our collection today and add a touch of elegance to your home with our exquisite Afghan rugs.
